li.label: Fast load
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is talented on shooting, and [PAWN_pronoun] finds {PAWN_objective} special way to reload \n\n"It's not that difficult, just hold your gun steady, close your eye, yeah, just one of them would be enough, aim, and then pull the trigger"

li.label: Defender
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves {PAWN_objective} home, and always tries {PAWN_objective} best to denfend the colony, When needed, [PAWN_pronoun] will always be the first person who responds and make exceptional effort\n\nAlthough [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't has any special skills or abilities, but [PAWN_pronoun] is still working hard to contribute to the colony everyday

li.label: Myasthenia
li.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} refused any exercises in his past life, that resulted in a weak body. 



 Max Carry Weight -10 kg

li.label: Weak
li.description:
Nobody knows why, but {PAWN_nameDef} always feels lack energy 

[PAWN_pronoun] works hard everyday and wish to finish the job and get to the bed earlier 



 Max Carry Weight -5 kg

li.label: Sturdy
li.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a strong body,that makes [PAWN_pronoun] good at meele fight 



 Max Carry Weight +10 kg

li.label: R O C K
li.description:
"I promise I was there,and I...... I saw this guy........[PAWN_pronoun] defeated a turtle without any weapons! OMG!" 
 ---by an anonymous pawn 



 Max Carry Weight +15 kg

li.label: Weird Neutral
Mind over Matter
li.description: Only a fraction of the potential contained within our minds has been unlocked. The latent psionic abilities of us are only now beginning to manifest in certain individuals\nAnd now,blindness brings {PAWN_nameDef} an oppotunity to take a peek at the power. The power enforced [PAWN_possessive] senses and provides {PAWN_objective} has an ablity to against some levels of thepsychic attack from external source

li.label: Professional Miner
li.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is a pretty good miner and [PAWN_pronoun] had once fallen in love with [PAWN_possessive] pickaxe and planned for a marriage, although this wasn't get supported by other people. 

{PAWN_nameDef} has been striving for the "Golden Drill" award of Prethoryn Company and dreaming that one day [PAWN_pronoun] can eventually go to the glitter world and work on a matter decompressor nearby the Great Wound galaxy 

Apparently, [PAWN_pronoun] has been working with pickaxe for too long, and now [PAWN_pronoun] is working hard to learn how to use modern tool. Apparently, [PAWN_pronoun] is not quite familar with it yet

li.label: A test
li.description: test trait

li.label: Slick
li.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has spent a great amount of time on learning about wording and socializing. [PAWN_pronoun] knows when to speak and what to say, that makes people like to have a conversation with {PAWN_objective} and {PAWN_objective} becomes a well-known merchant at the surrounding area 

{PAWN_nameDef} will never try to do insult ([PAWN_pronoun] will try [PAWN_possessive] best), and will not be affected by getting insulted from others 

"Only kids will try to do insult and hope it can hurt others, but sadly, words can only hurt those sissy folks"

li.label: Table Enjoyer
li.description: What's is the most important furniture in this world? What is the embodiment of the culmination of human wisdom？ Here comes the {PAWN_nameDef}'s answer: TABLE. If [PAWN_pronoun] can't eat on a table, [PAWN_pronoun] will lost the goal of life, and will be very upset. It's hard to calm {PAWN_objective} down, probably two days, or even one day

li.label: Foodie
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has great interest in food. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoys the time of preparing and having meal, [PAWN_pronoun] usually not pretty care about the ingredient of the dishes, even when they are made of some horrible ingredients. For {PAWN_nameDef}, if it tastes not bad, why bother caring about what it is before? \n\n{PAWN_nameDef} treats food very carefully, the food cooked by him is unlikely to have hygiene issues and [PAWN_pronoun] will spend more time on enjoying the food, gets happiness if the food is amazing. [PAWN_pronoun] is seeking for a chance to go the Midworld "Sol III" and try the foods there

li.label: Struggler
li.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} realizes that [PAWN_pronoun] is not smart, or even foolish,but [PAWN_pronoun] understands the rules of this world that [PAWN_pronoun] is living in, so [PAWN_pronoun] labors assiduously to make {PAWN_objective} more valueable. And [PAWN_pronoun] seems to be concerning about something all the time

{PAWN_nameDef} will never start a social fight and insult others, and more likely to praise, that is one of the skills [PAWN_pronoun] learned from the past experience 


 Skill loss rate x165%

li.label: Gangster
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoy bullying others,[PAWN_pronoun] just loves the feeling of insulting others, [PAWN_pronoun] will start a fight with the person that [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't like, whatever that person is a three years old kid or a tough meele lv20 guy. Often engaged in social fight let [PAWN_pronoun] acclimates to physical damage and somewhat good at meele fight

li.label: Veteran
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has participated in numerous battles. With a ranged weapons in hand makes {PAWN_objective} feel confident, since [PAWN_pronoun] believes the range is the truth. By experiencing multiple combats, [PAWN_pronoun] has become accustomed to death occurring in everyday life (and [PAWN_pronoun] has became a heavy sleeper)

li.label: Dynamite Miner
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef}, who learned some crooked tricks from somewhere, prefers using explosives to crush minerals and then picks up the large pieces of ore, instead of the traditional pickaxe which is time-consuming and laborious \n\n{PAWN_nameDef} is very satisfied with this fast method, and even likes to throw explosives down when using deep drilling. However, because [PAWN_pronoun] is not very professional in mining and [PAWN_pronoun] wil only pick the obvious large chunks of ore, that leads to a lot of waste. But when people asking about why [PAWN_pronoun] gets less ore than others, [PAWN_pronoun] always attributes this to impure ore vein.

li.label: Introverted
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} always curious about how other people can chat for an hour or even longer. [PAWN_pronoun] tends to become anxious and unable to speak especially when engaged in one-on-one conversations with others. {PAWN_nameDef} often works alone and loves reading since there is no need to spend time on social activity.\n\nDue to [PAWN_possessive] inadequacy in communicating, {PAWN_nameDef} has consistently been a victim of bullying and insulting, and [PAWN_pronoun] has become accustomed to them

li.label: Master Architect
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is extremely meticulous in his work, paying close attention to every component and material. With [PAWN_possessive] unique Spatial intelligence,{PAWN_nameDef} gains exceptional talent in the field of architecture, which allows {PAWN_objective} to create awe-inspiring structures. Although [PAWN_possessive] persistency to detail may prolong the process, the outcome is usually worth the extra effort\n\nCurrently, {PAWN_nameDef} is pondering and trying to solve an eternal problem in the architecture field: to build a table that can place lamps or plant pots on it

li.label: Art Master
li.description: Since [PAWN_possessive] childhood, {PAWN_nameDef} has been enamored with the arts, possessing a distinct and curious viewpoint towards everything in life. [PAWN_possessive] creations often seem to be messy or obscure, yet still manage to resonate with the audience. However, {PAWN_nameDef}'s work is widely admired, and [PAWN_pronoun] enjoys exchanging ideas with others, [PAWN_possessive] best work "Randy, pyromaniac, antigrain" is the result of a deep conversation [PAWN_pronoun] had with a random red mushroom on the ground

li.label: Combat medic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a combat medic, [PAWN_pronoun] has witnessed someone die from excessive blood loss in front of {PAWN_objective} before. Since that,[PAWN_pronoun] realizes the improtance of emergency rescue\n[PAWN_possessive] motto is "Time is of the Essence", When there is no time for the wounded person to lay down in the hopstial bed and wait for a meticulous treatment, [PAWN_pronoun] tends to perform a fast emergency response; although the price for the speed is quality. [PAWN_pronoun] won't allow the same scene to appears in front of [PAWN_possessive] again

li.label: Conscientious surgeon
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a responsible surgeon who cares deeply about the outcomes of [PAWN_possessive] work. [PAWN_pronoun] can't accept a failed surgery,if so, [PAWN_pronoun] will feel defeated and fall into extreme self-doubt. so [PAWN_pronoun] prefers taking some extra time for a sucessful medical treatment. However, [PAWN_pronoun] is only so concerned when it comes to the fellows in the faction. For the people from other factions, {PAWN_nameDef} will tend to just offer his blessings.

{PAWN_nameDef}'s life gets a bit challenging due to the issue of essential tremor, and lack of spatial awareness. [PAWN_pronoun] might take a few seconds to insert the screw into the screw hole or aim for a target when shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] considers this symptom as a shame and trys to hide it from others. \n\nA combat during the night is always a good news for {PAWN_objective} since [PAWN_pronoun] knows that noody knows if [PAWN_pronoun] missed most of the shots. What {PAWN_nameDef} would do at night is: "pull the trigger, and let the bullets to find their target"
li.label: Shaky
Artillery observer
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is well knowledged in operating artillery and predicting the path of shell.[PAWN_pronoun] knows how the wind would affect the projectile, that makes [PAWN_pronoun] a very accurate shooter \n\n{PAWN_nameDef} always loves to tell the story about how [PAWN_pronoun] once successfully used a mortar to accurately launch several pieces of pineapple onto a pizza being prepared in the kitchen, but it seems like people are not very convinced

li.label: Highly Intuitive
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't know why [PAWN_pronoun] is so talented in shooting. When [PAWN_pronoun] concentrates all [PAWN_possessive] attention in one direction, [PAWN_pronoun] can faintly feel something at a certain distance, even if the target is obscured by barrier. Therefore, [PAWN_possessive] long-range shooting results have always been among the best since the childhood. [PAWN_pronoun] used to think that this was an ability that everyone had when they grew up.\n\n However, when {PAWN_nameDef} realized that most people didn't have this ability, [PAWN_pronoun] immediately realized his uniqueness and came up with some evil ideas. So until now, [PAWN_pronoun] has never lost a single round in hide-and-seek games

li.label: Empathetic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} never likes to see someone feeling upset, [PAWN_pronoun] keeps trying to fill the colony with a good mood, althought {PAWN_objective}self is very susceptible to being affected by negative emotions. \n\n{PAWN_nameDef} has a often has a kind of intuition about other people's emotions and that feeling is usually true. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't know where did [PAWN_pronoun] get this ability, but [PAWN_pronoun] is happy with this

li.label: Epiphany
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} prefers to work at night, because [PAWN_pronoun] feels that his mind becomes calmer at that time, and [PAWN_pronoun] feels that [PAWN_pronoun] is being closer to some mysterious source, which [PAWN_pronoun] named it "The Shroud". [PAWN_pronoun] believes that this source is the common origin of consciousness and matter, and as [PAWN_possessive] mind approaching to The Shroud, [PAWN_pronoun] is getting closer to the intersection of matter and consciousness, which will let {PAWN_objective} receives more inspirations \n\nThe quality of {PAWN_nameDef}'s work mainly relies on the inspiration that flashes in his mind occasional, and it would be difficult for {PAWN_objective} to produce a large quantity of high-quality products. Without a good idea in mind, the quality is not guaranteed

li.label: Bloodthirsty
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} never cares about pain and blood. The pain [PAWN_pronoun] experiences during battles only makes [PAWN_possessive] adrenaline level skyrocketed and becomes more brutal\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] usually hides the negative emotions and unleashes all of them on the enemies during the battle, but note that, although {PAWN_nameDef} is friendly at most of the time, when [PAWN_pronoun] is unable to handle the mood and breaks, the thing is not as simple as just trying to destroy some structures or wandering around
